quote: Money and beauty are defenses against the sorrows of this world but neither can undo the past. Only time will conquer time. The way forward is the only way back to innocence and to peace.
quote_letters: MONEY AND BEAUTY ARE DEFENSES AGAINST THE SORROWS OF THIS WORLD BUT NEITHER CAN UNDO THE PAST ONLY TIME WILL CONQUER TIME THE WAY FORWARD IS THE ONLY WAY BACK TO INNOCENCE AND TO PEACE
